info.text: The ServiceNow CSN certifies that the owner has the skills and essential knowledge necessary to manage the configuration, implementation, and maintenance of the ServiceNow platform.

contents.diploma: Agile Methodologies of Cloud Software Engineering
details: Understanding techniques for high quality software development, with emphasis on web application development and cloud computing applications.
Understanding software development tools utilized in the context of Deloitte activities.

info.text: Understanding software development techniques (Scrum, Kanban, Extreme Programming)
Learning software development tools (Java, HTML, CSS, Javascript)
Learning software control techniques (Selenium WebDriver, Cucumber BDD, JMeter, Maven)
Introduction to the concept of ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) and the tools "Talend" & "Mulesoft"
